Description: 攻击状态 - 角色正在进行攻击
格挡状态 - 角色正在格挡
闪避状态 - 角色正在闪避
技能标签 - 太刀轻攻击连招
1: Actor/component has initially spawned and can be extended
2: All required data has been loaded/replicated and is ready for initialization
3: The available data has been initialized for this actor/component but not ready for full gameplay
4: The actor/component is fully ready for active gameplay
Ability failed to activate due to activation group constraints
Ability failed to activate because the owner is dead
测试技能 扔个石头
Character is stunned - cannot move or act
Character is rooted - cannot move but can act
Character is silenced - cannot use abilities
Character is slowed - reduced movement speed
Character is hasted - increased movement speed
Grievous Wounds - reduces healing received by 50%
Weak to Fire - takes +50% fire damage
Weak to Ice - takes +50% ice damage
Weak to Thunder - takes +50% thunder damage
Weak to Water - takes +50% water damage
Weak to Wind - takes +50% wind damage
Weak to Light - takes +50% light damage
Weak to Dark - takes +50% dark damage
Weakness hit damage feedback cue (extra visual/audio)
God mode - makes the player invincible
Unlimited health - health cannot drop below 1
